data.title: Visit HMS Belfast - Plan Your Visit
data.meta_description: Plan your visit to HMS Belfast. A historic warship and museum, exploring stories of life on board during conflict and peace. Great London museum for kids
data.text:
Step on board this iconic London landmark. Navigate your way around the rooms of this floating city, climbing up and down ladders to visit all nine decks.

Opening Times

10am - 6pm, last entry 5pm

Open every day except 24 to 26 December.

The Queen's Walk, London, SE1 2JH (view map)

Tickets

Advanced booking is advised.

See ticket prices and ticketing information

Book your visit to HMS Belfast

Family activities

IWM

There’s so much to see and do on board HMS Belfast. Enjoy family activities on board every weekend and every day during school holidays, free with your entry ticket.

To make the most of your family’s visit, be sure to check out our families page.

Life on Deck: A Guided Tour

© IWM

Hear the stories of the sailors, marines and airmen who made HMS Belfast feel like a floating city.

Learn from our expert guides about what kept the men of HMS Belfast going through freezing Arctic convoys, D-Day and the Korean War.

So much to see and do

IWM

The whole family will be amazed by the ship’s globe-trotting history, from firing some of the opening shots on D-Day, to sailing in freezing conditions of the Arctic Circle and serving in the Korean War.

© IWM

You’ll hear stories from the 950 people who lived and served on the ship, which had its own chapel, radio station and bakery and is so large you can almost lie Big Ben across its deck – twice!

© IWM

With family activities, fun interactive displays, and stunning views of the Thames, HMS Belfast is an unforgettable day out.

Members go free

IWM members get unlimited free entry to HMS Belfast, Churchill War Rooms & IWM Duxford, discounted events, priority booking and much more!

Sign up and explore even more...

Learn more about HMS Belfast’s life at sea and be the first to hear about the latest exhibitions, events and offers from IWM. Sign up now and get 10% off online shop purchases.
